item.title: Coming Soon! | 3-Minute Reset | Pat Lencioni & Chris Stefanick
item.description: Podcast Description Designed for busy professionals who are followers of Jesus, the 3-Minute Reset is a simple, daily reminder about what is most important in life. Pat Lencioni and Chris Stefanick provide a short, easy and conversational reflection that can help you stay focused on Christ amidst the distractions that can create so much stress and frustration in life. By setting aside just 180 seconds each day, you can find more peace and fulfillment in your work and your life.
